snippet: The U.S. government is considering using a powerful national security law to halt a private lawsuit against a non-profit group, United Against A Nuclear Iran, according to a source familiar with the case....

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: U.S. May Use Secrets Act to Stop Suit Against Iran Sanctions Group
headline.main: Exclusive: U.S. May Use Secrets Act to Stop Suit Against Iran Sanctions Group

lead_paragraph: The U.S. government is considering using a powerful national security law to halt a private lawsuit against a non-profit group, United Against A Nuclear Iran, according to a source familiar with the case.
